description: During [Operation CuckooBees](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0012), the threat actors generated a web shell within a vulnerable Enterprise Resource Planning Web Application Server as a persistence mechanism.(Citation: Cybereason OperationCuckooBees May 2022)

external_references.description: Cybereason Nocturnus. (2022, May 4). Operation CuckooBees: Deep-Dive into Stealthy Winnti Techniques. Retrieved September 22, 2022.
